name: MEC Balaclava - Children to Youths
categories: Toddler and child hats and toques
description:
This full-coverage balaclava is made from stretchy microfleece. It's cut long for good neck protection. Wear it alone or under a helmet or hood.Made of soft, moisture-wicking 100% polyester microfleece.Stretch binding keeps out the cold. Made from nylon/spandex.Flat seams for comfort.

        Sustainability
